title: Response to Friday Forum “Lessons From Black July And The Recommendations Of The LLRC”
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – Jayantha Dhanapala one time head of the Sri Lanka Peace Secretariat and Rev. Jayasiri T. Peiris has written on behalf of a group known as Friday Forum.
